body_html:

https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/2cfbd3347b943a389bb688125c2a90095b7735b5/tensorflow/core/ops/state_ops.cc
contains the doc and
https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/584d4921014db921a8f4722749adff09737826a8/tensorflow/core/kernels/scatter_op.cc
seems to be the actual implementation.
Will provide a PR soon
